title: NOPD: Ninth Bunny Friend Playground shooting suspect in custody
content:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) -
New Orleans Police have arrested the ninth suspect in the Nov 22, Bunny Friend Playground shooting that left 17 people hurt. Shawn "Shooter" Ruffin turned himself in Sunday night, according to police.
Ruffin's arrest comes just three days after Wilfred "Lil Wilfred" Celestine turned himself in to authorities. Also in custody are Allen "Snoop" Offray, Quendrick "C4" Bailey, Michael "Mack" Allen, Lawrence "L" Veals, Rashad "MKG Ezzy" Walker, Eddy Copelin and Malik "Leaky" Johnson.
Ruffin will be charged with 17 counts of attempted first degree murder.
